wpPost.title: Dr. Amit Jariwala on the origins of the Invention Studio
wpPost.content: The Invention Studio community began in 2009 in a mailroom and as since grown to become one of the top Makerspaces in the country. Dr. Amit Jariwala, Faculty Advisor to the Invention Studio, explains the history and creation of the Flowers Invention Studio. He explains the important role of the student peer instructors and the trust maintained between the student leaders and the university.
